title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories on the x axis representing Country, and Sales share in each Country on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Germany where Sales share is 15.0.
The lowest category is found at United Kingdom where Sales share is 6.0.
The highest value at Germany is almost 2.5 times larger than the minimum value of United Kingdom.
The highest value at Germany is almost 2.5 times larger than the minimum value of United Kingdom.
The difference between the max Country Germany and min Country United Kingdom is 9.0.
